triples.name: Object Constraint Language
triples.relevance: OCL is the specification language whose constraints are being mapped and checked for unsatisfiability in this paper.

triples.name: First-order logic
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel mapping from OCL to FOL as the foundation for checking constraint unsatisfiability.

triples.name: Satisfiability
triples.relevance: Checking satisfiability and unsatisfiability is the core task being addressed in the paper.

triples.name: Automated theorem proving
triples.relevance: The paper uses automated theorem provers as one of the reasoning tools to check constraint unsatisfiability.

triples.name: Satisfiability modulo theories
triples.relevance: SMT solvers are used as automated reasoning tools for checking the unsatisfiability of OCL constraint sets.
